about_the_game:
It is the year 2999...

AI has been nearly perfected, being used in our everyday lives. AVA (Artistic Virtual Assistant), is a revolutionary app which will allow people to create any physical work of art with the tap of a button. If AVA launches, humans will no longer be able to create, being fully dependent on their machines. Within the final 3 days before the new millennium begins, you must unite the few remaining artists together, and stop AVA from completing the AI Revolution of art.

Trillenium is a bite-sized RPG created by artists, for artists, as the voice that reminds us what makes art special that cannot be replaced. Because in this world, to lose art is to lose humanity itself.

Key Features
  • Unleash each character's unique Talent abilities to solve puzzles and defeat bosses.
  • Experience the constant dread and anxiety of the journey through fully voice-acted cutscenes and dialogue interactions.
  • Discover each artist's internal struggle through reading the Daily Journal, updated as the game progresses.
  • Celebrate the beauty of art itself through depictions of multiple artstyles, including watercolor, clay, and pencil sketches.

short_description: In the year 2999, art is on the brink of extinction by AI. Within 3 Days, unite the few remaining artists together to end AI's monopoly on society once and for all. Trillenium is a bite-sized 2D RPG created by artists, for artists, and reminds us that to lose art is to lose humanity itself.
